text.text_translated:
Carol Dweck studies how people think. She talks about an idea called a "growth mindset". A growth mindset is a way of thinking. With this idea, you believe you can learn and get better. She says our brains are not fixed. They can change and develop. We can learn new skills. We can learn things we are not good at.

Many of us praise the final result. Or we praise natural talents. For example, we say "You are very good with details." Or "You plan things very well."

But studies show there is a better way. We should praise the process. The process is how people do something. We should praise their hard work. We should also praise them for trying new things. We should praise their plans to solve problems. This helps people learn new skills. It also helps them get better at their talents.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Carol Dweck is a person. She studies how people think. She talks about an idea called a "growth mindset". A growth mindset is a way of thinking. This idea is that you believe you can learn and get better. She says our brains can change. We can learn new skills, even if we are not good at them at first.

Many of us praise the final result. Or we praise natural talents. For example, we say "You are very good with details." Or "You are very good at making plans for things."

But studies show there is a better way. We should praise how people do something. We should praise their effort. We should also praise their experiments and their ways of finding answers. This helps people learn new skills. And it helps them get better at their talents.
